about_the_game:
Mac Biskwi Adventures is a 2D platformer that brings back a nostalgic feeling and offers unique and fun-loving gameplay, with a mix of exploration and adventure. In a very solid and cute way. Fasten your seat belts… it’s time to rescue Mac’s missing girlfriend!

GO ON A JOURNEY OF DISCOVERY THROUGH BISCUIT’S ISLAND

Explore different levels with colorful visuals and special routes to be discovered, cross the trees and make your way through Biscuit’s Island while you get rid of evil creatures that are spreading the chaos on the Island.

BISCUITS & GOLDEN TOKENS!

Make sure to collect all the biscuits & golden tokens you see! Some might be in hidden places, so don’t forget to explore every single route of each map and don’t leave any collectibles behind!

COOL VEHICLES!

Discover a new vehicle available in each level and be prepared for a few surprises… Show your skateboarding skills, ride a shooting tank and even a mecha!

BEAT BIG BOSSES!

You’ll get to beat big bosses at the end of each level! They might look scary and stronger than our little monkey, but Mac is smart! Don’t forget to use walls to jump, avoid their abilities & beat’em up with your weapons!

OVERVIEW

  • A colorful and unexpected experience

  • 7 unique levels and 6 bosses

  • Different weapons for each level

  • Simple and smooth controls: you can use keyboard or a controller

  • Game modes: Normal and Hard

  • Levels are filled with enemies who can only be defeated by jumping on them or using weapons like a boomerang or a laser gun

  • Discover the true ending by finishing the game in Hard mode!

name: Mac Biskwi Adventures

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Mac Biskwi Adventures brings back a nostalgic feeling with a modern touch in this retro-inspired 2D platformer. Jump on this fun & colorful journey, where you'll explore different levels, collect biscuits and golden tokens to help Mac rescue his missing girlfriend.
supported_languages: English, French, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
